name: Hepburn: Takaishitai
description:
RELEASE DATE: 10/07/2020

ADD TO YOUR COLLECTION NOW!

A horror exploring psychological trauma and its lasting effects set in 90s American Suburbia.

FFO: Silent Hill, Resident Evil, Telltale Games.

This game was built in Twine and is best played in the Google Chrome web browser. Download the file, then open in Google Chrome.

Written and created by @emmahallows

Animation by Andrew.

Thank you Andy, you're the best!
